scripts.build-rduce: shx cp tailwind.config.rduce.js tailwind.config.js && snowpack build && shx cp -R ./theme/keywind ./theme/rduce-keywind
scripts.build-pixon: shx cp tailwind.config.pixon.js tailwind.config.js && snowpack build && shx cp -R ./theme/keywind ./theme/pixon-keywind
scripts.build-tgd: shx cp tailwind.config.tgd.js tailwind.config.js && snowpack build && shx cp -R ./theme/keywind ./theme/tgd-keywind
scripts.build-all: yarn build-rduce && yarn build-pixon && yarn build-tgd
